types:type.name: eventcatalog
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type eventcatalog = {| eventtypeid: Number {"typeId": "int"}, eventname: String, exchangename: String, routingkey: String, payload_encoding: String, vhost: String |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"eventtypeid\":1,\"eventname\":\"New Enrollment for spring 2019\",\"exchangename\":\"exam\",\"routingkey\":\"2019-spring\",\"payload_encoding\":\"string\",\"vhost\":\"capella.vhost\"}"}
